actions.description: The darkling elder makes two Scimitar attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Scimitar

actions.description: The darkling elder casts darkness, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.
actions.name: Darkness (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

specialTraits.description: When the darkling elder dies, magical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 7 (2d6) radiant damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.
specialTraits.name: Death Burn
